index.description: A comma-separated list of index names to register warmer for; use `_all` or empty string to perform the operation on all indices

name.description: The name of the warmer (supports wildcards); leave empty to delete all warmers

type.description: A comma-separated list of document types to register warmer for; use `_all` or empty string to perform the operation on all types

master_timeout.description: Specify timeout for connection to master
